name: Pombalia barbata

name: Pombalia cristalina

name: Pombalia insignis
remarks: doi:10.24823/EJB.2021.357 The epithet is the Latin word for 'remarkable, outstanding', in reference to the new species’ large and showy flowers compared with the other species of this group.

name: Rinorea gemmulata

remarks: doi:10.11646/phytotaxa.435.1.6 The epithet refers to the perulate buds with imbricate scales at the apex of most branches.
